statements: SELECT * FROM RoleBasedAccessControl;
SELECT user_id, role FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_id FROM RoleBasedAccessControl ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT access_level FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE access_level = 'restricted' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM RoleBasedAccessControl;
SELECT user_id, role, access_level FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND access_level IN ('read', 'write') ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY role;
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM RoleBasedAccessControl WHERE role IN ('admin', 'manager') ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, role FROM RoleBasedAccessControl GROUP BY role ORDER BY total_users DESC, role ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name, role_description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%'
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC
SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_id
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name, role_id + 100 AS modified_role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_id ORDER BY role_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles INNER JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.user_id = 27;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM devices WHERE device_owner = 'some_user_id';
SELECT * FROM device_permissions WHERE can_read = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_owner = 'f17e88bb-45a0-4c3c-b525-0179bd85c8a8';
SELECT device_name, device_owner FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%phone%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name FROM users INNER JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.device_owner WHERE users.role = 'admin';

SELECT devices.device_id, users.username, device_permissions.can_read FROM devices LEFT JOIN device_permissions ON devices.device_id = device_permissions.device_id INNER JOIN users ON device_permissions.user_id = users.user_id;

SELECT devices.device_name, users.username, device_permissions.can_write FROM devices RIGHT JOIN device_permissions ON devices.device_id = device_permissions.device_id INNER JOIN users ON device_permissions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE device_name='laptop';
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, device_id, data_value, timestamp FROM device_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT role_id, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM users GROUP BY role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role_id = 2
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT device_name, data_value FROM devices JOIN device_data ON devices.device_id = device_data.device_id
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM device ORDER BY owner_id ASC
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM device_data WHERE data_value LIKE '%important%'
SELECT device_name, timestamp FROM device INNER JOIN device_data ON device.device_id = device_data.device_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM device WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin');
SELECT device_id, MAX(data_value) AS max_data_value FROM device_data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 5;
